about_the_game:
Are you looking for a legendary quest-builder game?  Do you want to test and challenge your creativity while crafting your own adventures? If yes, then look no further than Quest Crafter!!

A brief introduction to the Quest Crafter:

Welcome to the Quest Crafter game, where creativity knows no bounds. Come up with an idea and start crafting unique buildings from static and dynamic elements, including buildings, terrain, doors, steps, stones, etc.
Quest Crafter also lets you customize your character to make it look more outstanding. Create your own quest with your own rules. Set your own rules like a time limit and tasks for other players to complete within the specific time. Share your quests with your friends or with the whole world to challenge them. You can also play quests created by others.

Key Features of the Quest Crafter:
+ Realtime Multiplayer
 + A step-wise guide to understanding the game
+ Customize the environment, including the sky, snow, and rain.
 + Craft buildings with a wide range of static and dynamic elements.  
+ Get a variety of enemies, NPC, weapons, shields, and other items.
 + Customize your character.
+ Friends list - build and share quests with your friends.
+ Global list - publish your quests to challenge players from around the world or play quests created by others.
+ Mark your quests as favorites to easily find them next time when you want to play it.
